name: Applified
tag_list: mobile-enterprise-apps, mobile, business-apps, iphone, ipad, android
overview:
At Applified, we believe the future of doing business is mobile. Therefore we set out to create powerful, high quality and easy-to-use Apps to connect businesses to a growing mobile world.

European companies and organizations lack knowledge on how to apply strategies in the quickly expanding mobile world. Their customers and employees, however, expect them to be present in the mobile market, rather sooner than later. Today, the online Mobile Market is growing rapidly. Many customers switch to smartphones like the iPhone and Android devices. Companies strategize about connecting their brand to this digital revolution. A need for speed and efficiency exists in a more flexible future world. Companies need help in positioning their brands on the online mobile platform. Applified will help companies strategize, design and develop mobile applications to make them ready for the inevitable mobile future.

Get your business Applified!
